concept: Use inheritance to reuse and extend behavior from a base class.

challenges.title: Person and Student (Inheritance)
challenges.description: Create a base class Person with data member name and a member function printName() that prints the name. Create a derived class Student that adds an integer rollNo and a function printDetails() that prints name and rollNo on one line separated by space.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: name (single word). Second line: rollNo (integer).

challenges.title: Employee Salary (Simple Inheritance)
challenges.description: Create a base class Employee with a name and a derived class FullTimeEmployee with an additional salary. Read name and salary, and print them in the format: name salary.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: name (single word). Second line: integer salary.
